title: No challenge, no escape
author: VD
content_html:
Alt★Hero Episode 4 is now live on Webtoons.

In other project news, we have decided that the fourth book in the Castalia Library series will be Dante’s The Divine Comedy, complete with woodcuts from the 1491 Venetian edition by Pietro di Piasi Cremonese. While we had originally intended to do Inferno, upon further contemplation of the task at hand, we decided the Library team was ready to tackle a more substantial project.
content_text:
Alt★Hero Episode 4 is now live
on Webtoons
.
In other project news, we have decided that the fourth book in
the Castalia Library series
will be Dante’s
The Divine Comedy
, complete with woodcuts from the 1491 Venetian edition by Pietro di Piasi Cremonese. While we had originally intended to do
Inferno
, upon further contemplation of the task at hand, we decided the Library team was ready to tackle a more substantial project.
